page.title: 13FACTORIES IN THE NE. AREA
page.content: The area round Estover is used mainly for housing and light industry.It is a recent development since the early 70's.Some of the factories are engaged in high technology such as Texas Instruments,Bardens,Arrow Hart and Virgin Circuits.Others as engineering training centres .Paper is also processed by MacDonald & Evans, Chase Web and MacNaughton Papers.There are food processing plants such as Wrigley's,Freeze West & Crusty Bayke as well as a cash & carry.Andrewartha is a glass cutting firm.Ryfords make plastic mouldings and Castle Kitchens. Stafford Miller make toothpaste, brushes etc. By the Marsh Mills Roundabout there is also a small light industrial area making similar products to above.
